column5: I have ALWAYS wanted to work with @ MaraBrockAkil & @ TheSalimAkil and it’s finally happening! Who didn’t love Girlfriends and Being Mary Jane?! Let me be the first to tell you, you are going to fall in love with LOVE IS ___. Our brand-new series coming to OWN this June. # LoveIspic.twitter.com/5omCbtXpmc
